verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be still and know that I am God.
Be still and know that I am God.
Be still and know that I am God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am the Lord that heals your pain.
I am the Lord that heals your pain.
I am the Lord that heals your pain.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In you, o, Lord, do I put my trust.
In you, o, Lord, do I put my trust.
In you, o, Lord, do I put my trust.
